languages.text: В последующие годы флот Осознание планомерно совершал исход из освоенных систем Простора на дальние рубежи. Были оставлены наблюдательные станции и освоенные миры, даже Ефрат-II пришел в упадок. Статистическое прорицание указало конклаву флота на темные события, ожидавшие Простор, и те предпочли увести из-под удара своих братьев, но не пожелали делиться сим откровением с мирянами.

In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.
languages.original_text: В последующие годы флот Осознание планомерно совершал исход из освоенных систем Простора на дальние рубежи. Были оставлены наблюдательные станции и освоенные миры, даже Ефрат-II пришел в упадок. Статистическое прорицание указало конклаву флота на темные события, ожидавшие Простор, и те предпочли увести из-под удара своих братьев, но не пожелали делиться сим откровением с мирянами.

traits.locale_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were left empty, and even Eufrates II fell into abandonment. Static divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their brothers from the coming storm. Yet they did not share the truth that was revealed to them with the laypeople.

Static divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their brothers from the coming storm. Yet they did not share the truth that was revealed to them with the laypeople.

Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. languages.text: 在接下来的许多年里，真理开拓者舰队慢慢地搬出了扩区内已被探索的星系，前往最遥远的区域。他们曾经的观测站与世界如今已遭到了遗弃，甚至连欧夫拉茨二号星也空无一人。数据占卜师向舰队秘会发出警告，告诉开拓者科罗努斯扩区即将发生可怕的事情，开拓者们决定将自己的同伴们从迫近的风暴中解救出来。不过，他们并没有与教外人士分享真理。
languages.original_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

traits.locale_text: 在接下来的许多年里，真理开拓者舰队慢慢地搬出了扩区内已被探索的星系，前往最遥远的区域。他们曾经的观测站与世界如今空无一人，甚至连欧夫拉茨二号星也被遗弃了。数据占卜师向舰队秘会发出警告，告诉开拓者科罗努斯扩区即将发生可怕的事情，开拓者们决定将自己的同伴们从迫近的风暴中解救出来。不过，他们并没有与教外人士分享真理。

languages.text: In den folgenden Jahren verließ die Erkenntnisflotte langsam und geplant die erkundeten Systeme der Ausdehnung, um in die abgeschiedensten Regionen zu reisen. Beobachtungsstationen und eroberte Welten wurden leer zurückgelassen, selbst Eufrates II wurde aufgegeben. Statistische Prophetie warnte die Konklave der Flotte vor den düsteren Ereignissen, welche die Ausdehnung erwarteten, und sie entschieden, ihre Brüder vor dem kommenden Sturm zu bewahren. Dem Laienstand aber verschwiegen sie die Wahrheit.
languages.original_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

traits.locale_text: In den folgenden Jahren verließ die Erkenntnisflotte langsam und geplant die erkundeten Systeme der Ausdehnung, um in die abgeschiedensten Regionen zu reisen. Beobachtungsstationen und eroberte Welten wurden leer zurückgelassen, selbst Eufrates II wurde aufgegeben. Statistische Prophetie warnte die Konklave der Flotte vor den düsteren Ereignissen, welche die Ausdehnung erwarteten, und sie entschieden, ihre Brüder vor dem kommenden Sturm zu bewahren. Dem Laienstand aber verschwiegen sie die Wahrheit.

languages.text: Au cours des années qui suivirent, la Flotte de la Connaissance délaissa les systèmes déjà explorés afin de se diriger lentement, mais sûrement vers les zones les plus reculées des Étendues. Les stations d'observation et les mondes civilisés furent désertés, et même Euphrate-II se retrouva à l'abandon. Après avoir été mis en garde par la divination statistique contre les terribles événements qui menaçaient les Étendues, le conclave de la flotte avait décidé de protéger ses homologues contre la tempête à venir. Toutefois, il n'avait pas jugé utile d'informer les profanes de cette décision.
languages.original_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

traits.locale_text: Au cours des années qui suivirent, la Flotte de la Connaissance délaissa les systèmes déjà explorés afin de se diriger lentement, mais sûrement vers les zones les plus reculées des Étendues. Les stations d'observation et les mondes civilisés furent désertés, et même Euphrate-II se retrouva à l'abandon. Après avoir été mis en garde par la divination statistique contre les terribles événements qui menaçaient les Étendues, le conclave de la flotte avait décidé de protéger ses homologues contre la tempête à venir. Toutefois, il n’avait pas jugé utile d'informer les profanes de cette décision.

languages.text: En los años siguientes, la Flota Conciencia abandonó de forma lenta y deliberada los sistemas explorados de la Extensión para dirigirse a regiones más remotas. Vaciaron sus estaciones de observación y mundos reclamados, e incluso Eufrates II cayó en el abandono. La adivinación estadística advirtió al cónclave de la Flota de los siniestros eventos que se desarrollarían en la Extensión, y decidieron salvaguardar a los suyos de la tormenta que se avecinaba. Sin embargo, no compartieron la información con el resto del sector.
languages.original_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

traits.locale_text: En los años siguientes, la Flota Conciencia abandonó de forma lenta y deliberada los sistemas explorados de la Extensión para dirigirse a regiones más remotas. Vaciaron sus estaciones de observación y mundos reclamados, e incluso Eufrates II cayó en el abandono. La adivinación estadística advirtió al cónclave de la Flota de los siniestros eventos que se desarrollarían en la Extensión, y decidieron salvaguardar a los suyos de la tormenta que se avecinaba. Sin embargo, no compartieron la información con el resto del sector.

languages.text: その後の数年間、コグニサンス艦隊はエクスパンスの探検済みの星系を離れ、最も遠い辺境の地へとゆっくりと、そして慎重に移動していった。観測ステーションや領有権を有する星々は空っぽのまま放棄され、ユーフラテス・IIさえも廃墟と化した。統計的なディビネーションにより、船団の協議会にエクスパンクスが待ち受ける厳しい出来事を警告し、来るべき嵐から仲間を救い出すことを決意した。しかし、彼らはその真実を一般市民には伝えなかった。
languages.original_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

traits.locale_text: その後の数年間、コグニサンス艦隊はエクスパンスの探検済みの星系を離れ、最も遠い辺境の地へとゆっくりと、そして慎重に移動していった。観測ステーションや領有権を有する星々は空っぽのまま放棄され、ユーフラテス・IIさえも廃墟と化した。統計的なディビネーションにより、船団の協議会にエクスパンクスが待ち受ける厳しい出来事を警告し、来るべき嵐から仲間を救い出すことを決意した。しかし、彼らはその真実を一般市民には伝えなかった。

languages.text: İlerleyen yıllarda Malumat Filosu, en uzak bölgelere gitmek üzere Enginlik'in keşfedilmiş sistemlerinden yavaşça ve kasıtlı olarak ayrıldı. Gözlem istasyonları ve ele geçirilen dünyalar terk edildi. Eufrates II bile harabeye dönüştü. İstatistiksel kehanetler, Enginlik'i bekleyen uğursuz olaylar konusunda filo meclisini uyardı. Onlar da yoldaşlarını yaklaşan fırtınadan kurtarmaya karar verdi. Ancak bu gerçek, avamdan saklandı.
languages.original_text: In the following years, the Cognisance Fleet slowly and deliberately left the explored systems of the Expanse for the furthest remote regions. Observation stations and claimed worlds were abandoned, and even Eufrates II became derelict. Statistical divination warned the fleet's conclave of the grim events awaiting the Expanse, and they decided to deliver their fellows from the coming storm. Yet, they did not share the truth with the laypeople.

traits.locale_text: İlerleyen yıllarda Malumat Filosu, en uzak bölgelere gitmek üzere Enginlik'in keşfedilmiş sistemlerinden yavaş yavaş ve kasıtlı olarak ayrıldı. Gözlem istasyonları ve ele geçirilen dünyalar terk edildi. Eufrates II bile bir harabe hâline geldi. İstatistiksel kehanetler, filonun meclisini Enginlik'i bekleyen uğursuz olaylar konusunda uyardı ve onlar da yoldaşlarını yaklaşan fırtınadan kurtarmaya karar verdiler. Avamdan ise bu gerçek gizlendi.
